item.description: You will have a terrific time speed dating 5 minutes at a time with multiple singles in your age range. This is a fast paced fun way to assess that chemistry in just 5 minutes. If you like the person you check their name on your match card. If you don't the bell will ring and just 5 minutes and you can just move on. It is fun, quick and it works!! Be sure to register for this event at www.got5minutes.com. The rsvp list on this site is only a fraction of those attending as we promote through many different venues.
item.how_to_find_us: we are in the private room
item.name: Singles Over 40
